archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Monitor Service Alarms Events
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description This process is responsible for collecting and monitoring events and alarms provided by services though systems and monitoring tools. Extended Description This process is responsible for collecting and monitoring events and alarms provided by services though systems and monitoring tools. Explanatory Reserved for future use.
